metadata.title: CVE-2018-19199 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows an integer overflow via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* function because of an unchecked multiplication. It was discovered that uriparser mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause uriparser to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: uriparser package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-2').
